description.raw:
As part of refactoring [https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2977/add-gz\_profile-and-introspectionmanager/diff](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2977/add-gz_profile-and-introspectionmanager/diff), I have decided to bring the Profiler into the ignition-common library.

This is still a work in progress, but it shows the implementation of using Remotery \([https://github.com/Celtoys/Remotery](https://github.com/Celtoys/Remotery)\) to profile multiple threads and visualize.

Remotery itself does not provide any CMake logic, so I have done so here: [https://github.com/mjcarroll/remotery\_vendor](https://github.com/mjcarroll/remotery_vendor)

Multiple profiler implementations can be created by inheriting from the ProfilerImpl obj.

You can use the Remotery profiler by:

    # In one terminal
    ./build/ignition-common3/bin/UNIT_Profiler_TEST
    # In another terminal (assuming remotery_vendor)
    xdg-open ./install/share/Remotery/vis/index.html
description.html:
As part of refactoring https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2977/add-gz_profile-and-introspectionmanager/diff, I have decided to bring the Profiler into the ignition-common library.

This is still a work in progress, but it shows the implementation of using Remotery (https://github.com/Celtoys/Remotery) to profile multiple threads and visualize.

Remotery itself does not provide any CMake logic, so I have done so here: https://github.com/mjcarroll/remotery_vendor

Multiple profiler implementations can be created by inheriting from the ProfilerImpl obj.

You can use the Remotery profiler by:

# In one terminal
./build/ignition-common3/bin/UNIT_Profiler_TEST
# In another terminal (assuming remotery_vendor)
xdg-open ./install/share/Remotery/vis/index.html

title: Create a common Profiler
